section.name: Getting Started with Jadabs
section.p: This document (as well as the others in this section) provide an introduction to Jadabs and how to use it for your mobile device.

subsection.name: Overview of the Getting Started Documentation

tr.td: Before you can start using Jadabs in any form, you'll have to download and install the Jadabs distribution to your system (unless you plan on building Jadabs from source).
This user guide gives a short introduction to the use of Jadabs. Examples are shown for dynamic AOP, building bunles, and starting the container with new bundles.
For the adventurous (its actually quite easy), you can build Jadabs from source. This document provides you with step by step instructions to build and generate the documentation for Jadabs.
